newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Midway Games upgraded.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Midway Games upgraded.

text.p: - Robertson, Stephens & Co research analyst Keith Benjamin upgraded his rating on Midway Games Inc. to a Buy from Long Term Attractive.
-- The brokergae firm said Benjamin is raising his rating on Midway based on significant potential for earnings upside due to a strong slate of new arcade and video titles.
-- Said he expects the company to see strong video game sales in 1997 and 1998 with such games as Mortal Kombat IV, Quake 64, San Francisco Rush and Wayne Gretzky's 3D Hockey.
-- In addition, he said a possible spin-out of 86.6% of shares held by WMS could help the stock.
Benjamin's EPS estimate for F1997 is $1.02 and for F1998 is $1.20.
